item.title: makeup
item.media:title: makeup
item.media:description:
a short funny thing I did with my pokemon avatar Bathoria (a chara I make on my blog on tumblr) and Lance the-vampire-inside-me.tumblr.c…

this Gardevoir instead is Lance's friend, Juliette

this sweet gardevoir belongs to an ex pokemon trainer who leaved his career to have a family and a more quiet life, Juliette wanted to stay with him instead to be freed or selled into a pokemon daycare.
She never leaved her master, even when he was married and got childrens, Juliet don't fight anymore and instead now she help with family issues and household chores: so she take care of the children, help her master wife to cook, clean the house, etc etc...
When she meeted Lance for the first time it happened casually: the lucario get too much closer to her master's home, the ex pokemon trainer gave him something to eat and hospitality,
and with the time Lance and Juliet befriended.
Even thought she's faithful to her family and her master, she's always curious about Lance's travels, about every place he visited, so he tells all she want to know in exchange of a good meal.

(Juliet belongs to

a character I've created for my friend , for a story that we're planning:

item.title: Bahira
item.media:title: Bahira
item.media:description:
music: www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2uYwV…

Me and sometimes hypothesized how could appear 's mother, since officially her mother's a pure genie, while her father's a mortal.
We worked a little on her possible appearance and how she could be, and finally she's complete
her name "Bahira" in arabian means "brilliant" as her element is: the fire.
item.description:

We worked a little on her possible appearance and how she could be, and finally she's complete
her name "Bahira" in arabian means "brilliant" as her element is: the fire.

item.title: Pm01
item.media:title: Pm01
item.media:description:
"Where hinges creak in doorless chambers, where strange and frightening sounds echo through the halls, where candlelights flicker though the air is deathly still… This is Phantom Manor." (Vincent Price, Phantom Manor)

the prologue music: X-Ray Dog- Ghost Story

ok, let me explain all: time passed since Oz was interrupted, duties and problems gave me no time for continue it, plus, the lost of inspiration to go on.. so for now I want to consider the first part of the story ended.
I'll resume it soon, no worry, but for now I wanted so much to realize this short story "Phantom Manor", the new adventure of our favourite Count and Voivoda* (that means "monarch" in romanian)
item.description:
"Where hinges creak in doorless chambers, where strange and frightening sounds echo through the halls, where candlelights flicker though the air is deathly still… This is Phantom Manor." (Vincent Price, Phantom Manor)

the prologue music: X-Ray Dog- Ghost Story

ok, let me explain all: time passed since Oz was interrupted, duties and problems gave me no time for continue it, plus, the lost of inspiration to go on.. so for now I want to consider the first part of the story ended.
I'll resume it soon, no worry, but for now I wanted so much to realize this short story "Phantom Manor", the new adventure of our favourite Count and Voivoda* (that means "monarch" in romanian)

item.title: Wayforward Girls
item.media:title: Wayforward Girls
item.media:description:
sooo there's another piece I worked from yesterday
this is simply a little dedication to Wayforward, they created two awesome characters: Shantae (the half-genie hero) and Patricia (from Mighty switch force) who her next game will be released this october with "Mighty switch force 2" HD for Wii U; meanwhile for our beautiful half-genie the Wayforward just opened a Kickstarter campaign with a new game of Shantae.

Me and my friend just give a support and I've created this artwork, I hope you'll like it, and support too the new Wayforward ideas
item.description:
sooo there's another piece I worked from yesterday

Me and my friend just give a support and I've created this artwork, I hope you'll like it, and support too the new Wayforward ideas

item.title: the dream
item.media:title: the dream
item.media:description:
recently told me about a dream he had, it was so inspiring that I did the illustration:

"..I asked her why, and she answered me that she couldn't be seen by adult visitors, she belong only to the children but wanted to visit me, because she felt I needed her.

She embraced me and kissed my cheek from behind, on my skin I felt like a sweet, cold breeze,
then she told me that if I was sad, she was sad too,

instinctively I asked her to not cry

and NiGHTS chuckled, told me to not cry."
item.description:
recently told me about a dream he had, it was so inspiring that I did the illustration:

"..I asked her why, and she answered me that she couldn't be seen by adult visitors, she belong only to the children but wanted to visit me, because she felt I needed her.

She embraced me and kissed my cheek from behind, on my skin I felt like a sweet, cold breeze,
then she told me that if I was sad, she was sad too,

instinctively I asked her to not cry

and NiGHTS chuckled, told me to not cry."

item.title: Top Ranger recensione
item.media:title: Top Ranger recensione
item.media:description:
Ed eccomi qui, dopo una lunga assenza ho voluto dedicarmi a una storia a fumetti che mi ha interessato: "The Top Ranger" (Mouse Ranger se vogliamo) appena uscito sul nuovo numero di Topolino 3005, in cui si raccontano le gesta di un giustiziere mascherato nato dalle ceneri dell ex sceriffo Topolino, sempre accompagnato nelle sue avventure dallo squinternato ma saggio sciamano Tonto-Lone (Pippo).
Questa storia basata sul nuovo film della Disney "The Lone Ranger" che uscir qui in Italia il 3 luglio 2013 -tratta da una famosa serie tv degli anni 40-50 -

Ovviamente, trattandosi di un fumetto parodia del film, la sua trama stata adattata e accorciata per una storia autoconclusiva, in cui fra varie gag il nostro eroe mascherato accetta il suo destino e combatte i soprusi e le violenze di Pietro Gambadilegno e i suoi scagnozzi capeggiati da Macchia Nera, ma nonostante la trama a sfondo comico ci sono dei problemi che purtroppo gli autori e sceneggiatori di "Topolino" non hanno MAI superato a mio parere: qui Topolino era ed sempre rimasto il tipico eroe perfettino che non sbaglia mai, mentre chi continua a trascinare il protagonista nei guai o inscenare gag Pippo, ridotto a spalla comica dell'ormai troppo perfetto topo.

La storia molto bella ma avrei preferito vedere pi carisma da parte di Topolino, la cui stella ormai sta venendo inesorabilmente oscurata da Pippo e Paperino.

Ovviamente questo un mio parere personale, se lo avete letto ditemi cosa ne pensate
item.description:
Ed eccomi qui, dopo una lunga assenza ho voluto dedicarmi a una storia a fumetti che mi ha interessato: "The Top Ranger" (Mouse Ranger se vogliamo) appena uscito sul nuovo numero di Topolino 3005, in cui si raccontano le gesta di un giustiziere mascherato nato dalle ceneri dell ex sceriffo Topolino, sempre accompagnato nelle sue avventure dallo squinternato ma saggio sciamano Tonto-Lone (Pippo).
Questa storia basata sul nuovo film della Disney "The Lone Ranger" che uscir qui in Italia il 3 luglio 2013 -tratta da una famosa serie tv degli anni 40-50 -

Ovviamente, trattandosi di un fumetto parodia del film, la sua trama stata adattata e accorciata per una storia autoconclusiva, in cui fra varie gag il nostro eroe mascherato accetta il suo destino e combatte i soprusi e le violenze di Pietro Gambadilegno e i suoi scagnozzi capeggiati da Macchia Nera, ma nonostante la trama a sfondo comico ci sono dei problemi che purtroppo gli autori e sceneggiatori di "Topolino" non hanno MAI superato a mio parere: qui Topolino era ed sempre rimasto il tipico eroe perfettino che non sbaglia mai, mentre chi continua a trascinare il protagonista nei guai o inscenare gag Pippo, ridotto a spalla comica dell'ormai troppo perfetto topo.

La storia molto bella ma avrei preferito vedere pi carisma da parte di Topolino, la cui stella ormai sta venendo inesorabilmente oscurata da Pippo e Paperino.

Ovviamente questo un mio parere personale, se lo avete letto ditemi cosa ne pensate

item.title: Le Piume Della Fenice
item.media:title: Le Piume Della Fenice
item.media:description:
my tribute for the new story by
first chapter already up

music: [link]

sected into a world now covered by endless seas, there are only few islands and the airplane pilots are the most trusted achievers and adventurers.
Mickey is a courier that fly with his red biplane "Dream", instead Oswald is a pirate and his rival,
the two of them conflict with each other.
But under that earth submerged by the sea, an ancient mystery with the shape of a fire bird bring legends and tales..
what's for real this legendary Phoenix and which powers it has?

item.title: Festa Della Liberazione
item.media:title: Festa Della Liberazione
item.media:description:
25 aprile 1945,
un giorno fondamentale per la storia d'Italia: la fine dell'occupazione nazista ed il termine del ventennio fascista.

it's an important day for italian story: the end of the nazi occupation and the end of twenty years of fascism.

item.title: it can't be TRUE
item.media:title: it can't be TRUE
item.media:description:
this morning, my friend warned me about a shocking news from our favourite house of dreams, Disney:

according to this news, Disney GUITTED their hand-drawn animation division! [link]

THIS. CAN'T. BE!!!
I can't believe they really done this, they pratically throw away their tradition for run after the fashions of the moment and the LOW COST animations: like Mickey Mouse clubhouse, the upcoming shorts with FLASH animations (it's a cute idea but the animation is inspired from the new and famous my little pony series)

I mean, it's TOO EASY to use the flash animation and the 3D! Disney was famous even for their hand-drawn animations (masterpieces!) and what about the new movie "Frozen", isn't the main character a recycled Rapunzel with different haircut and clothes?

Disney... WTF are you doing?!

please tell me about your opinions

I mean, it's TOO EASY to use the flash animation and the 3D! Disney was famous even for their hand-drawn animations (masterpieces!) and what about the new movie "Frozen", isn't the main character a recycled Rapunzel with different haircut and clothes?
